   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Biosim's documentation!
==================================

.. figure:: favicon.png
    :width: 200px
    :align: right
    :height: 200px
    :alt: alternate text
    :figclass: align-center

    EPAP logo

Biosim is a simple simulation of an ecosystem, containing only two species.
The point is to see how the two species evolve over time with limited food and limited space. |br|
|br|
**Will both species survive?**


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   whatisbiosim
   read
   animals
   landscape
   island
   simulation
